channel.title: Moparscape
channel.description:
This is directed to any staff who have been here for a very long time, and most importantly MITB.
How long do plan to keep this website up for?
I suppose you are around 18-23; when do you think it will be time to call it quits?
And after this, what will happen?
Are you going to hand over the site to someone else? If so, then who?
What does the future hold for this site?
Comments by any other members are okay too.

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:20, topic:382542”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=478335.msg3500999#msg3500999 date=1297731622]

I have no plans to shut down this site or moparisthebest.com, but I promise that if I were ever to retire from the scene, I wouldn’t just shut it down, but would give it over to be ran by someone else trustworthy, most likely another admin. I guess on the off-chance no one wanted it, I’d still host it as an archive.
[/quote]I WILL TAKE IT OFF YOUR HANDS!

LOL, he gives it too kracky, and in two months it’s like a porn site.[/quote] nah I would just make this place into a dating site.

Are you a lonely 10year old boy?, Do you like to be a female on video games?, Then come to moparisthebest.com/dating We got all of the 15year old gay guys you want!

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I don’t think mopar has any plans to shut down the site, at least anytime soon. It may live just as long as rsps, rs cheating, or the general community lives. I’m not sure which would die out first.

What would happen if he did shut this place down eventually?
I’d guess the rsps scene would move entirely to another major rs server site that I won’t name.
Or perhaps, our community would wind up at a new website, created by a well liked user here. Kind of like when kaitnieks.com shut down, and we flocked to moparisthebest.com. Maybe we could even use the same db, if mopar trusted them to run the place. Or maybe he would let someone else take over this site.

I suspect for the mitb community, someone reputable on IRC would create a site where the mitb people flock to.

But this is all pretty unlikely to happen any time soon. This site does generate income, so paying for it shouldn’t be much of a problem. I don’t think jagex poses much threat to us.

This scene/community was indirectly started nearly 10 years ago by rs cheaters. I wouldn’t expect it leaving just yet. Websites come and go, but the community will live.

Read full topic
